Title: My Dear Enemy
Writer: Yoon-ki Lee (screenplay), Eun-yeong Park (screenplay), Asuko Taira (novel)
Actors: Do-yeon Jeon, Jung-woo Ha, Il-hwa Choi, Ju-bong Gi
Plot: Jobless, single and in her early thirties, Hee-soo is miserable. Desperate, she sets out to find her ex-boyfriend, Byoung-woon, who owes her $3,500. Rather inconveniently, it turns out that...
